text: Adib Kenkre (born 13 January) is an Indian professional coach, former footballer and currently owns his own club Kenkre FC who play in the I-League 2nd Division. Adib Kenkre is a retired Central Railway Zone (India) employee. He coached football in the famous Bombay Scottish School for a time span of 20 years. At Bombay Scottish School he led the team to many trophies. He was also coach of the U16 Team of the year 2015 who were arguably the best team Scottish ever had. He led them to an amazing season, with winning D.S.O, runners up in MSSA, winners of Ahmad Sailor tournament, third in zonals and fourth in Anglos. They also beat their long old rivals, Don Bosco, twice the same year in the semis of MSSA and finals of Ahmed Sailor ; school where once Sir Kenkre used to coach. The Kenkre Football Academy in Mumbai, India, was started by him in 2000. ==References== Category:Indian footballers Category:Indian football managers Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Footballers from Goa Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Adib Kenkre
